name: Bombastic Village
description:
You're the new resident of a very exotic neighborhood, and your first week there, you wake up with a bomb stuck in your body.

Now, you need to talk to all your neighbors to find out the bomb deactivation password, otherwise you will explode.

Menu

Mouse Scrol, Up and Down, W and S - Menu Scrol

Left Mouse, Enter, E, Space - Menu Enter

In Game

Left ALT and Right ALT, O and L - Audio Switch

Up, Down, Left and Right - Camera Movemment

TAB - Minimap

Left Mouse - Player Movemment

Left SHIFT - Run Active

Right Mouse - NPC Chat Start (In any NPC)

Right Mouse - Use Contructions Functions (In Objects)

E - Password Write Start (In Mr. Mouse)

Game Run

ESC - Return to menu after Lose or Wining

F5 - Restart All Game

Have you exploded recently?
